import React, { useState }from 'react'; import { Card, Button, CardTitle, CardText, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap'; function CalculatingDistatance(){ const [distance, updateDistance] = useState({ walking: 0, driving: 0, flight:0, value:0 }) let walkingSpeed = 5; let drivingSpeed = 120 ; let flightSpeed = 900; const updateValue = ev => updateDistance({ value:[ev.target.value], walking: (Math.round(((+ev.target.value / 60) * 60) / walkingSpeed)).toFixed(2), driving: (Math.round(((+ev.target.value % 3600 / 60) * 60) / drivingSpeed)), flight: (((+ev.target.value % 3600 / 60) * 60) / flightSpeed).toFixed(2) }) return(

Add distance in km/h


Walking Driving Flight
)}; export default CalculatingDistatance
